00031 #ifndef OPENVDB_POINTS_TYPES_HAS_BEEN_INCLUDED
00032 #define OPENVDB_POINTS_TYPES_HAS_BEEN_INCLUDED
00033 
00034 #include <openvdb/version.h>
00035 #include <openvdb/Platform.h>
00036 #include <openvdb/Types.h>
00037 #include <OpenEXR/half.h>
00038 
00039 namespace openvdb {
00040 OPENVDB_USE_VERSION_NAMESPACE
00041 namespace OPENVDB_VERSION_NAME {
00042 
00043 // add some extra typeNameAsString specializations
00044 
00045 template<> inline const char* typeNameAsString<half>()                   { return "half"; }
00046 template<> inline const char* typeNameAsString<int16_t>()                { return "int16"; }
00047 template<> inline const char* typeNameAsString<math::Vec3<half> >()      { return "vec3h"; }
00048 template<> inline const char* typeNameAsString<math::Vec3<uint8_t> >()   { return "vec3u8"; }
00049 template<> inline const char* typeNameAsString<math::Vec3<uint16_t> >()  { return "vec3u16"; }
00050 
00051 
00053 
00054 
00055 } // namespace OPENVDB_VERSION_NAME
00056 } // namespace openvdb
